# octopusdeploy_space_default_retention_policy (Data Source)

Manages a space's default retention policy.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `retention_type` (String) The type of retention policy.

### Optional

- `retention_policy` (Block, Optional) The default retention policy for the space. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--retention_policy))
- `space_id` (String) The space ID associated with this space default retention policy.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique ID for this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--retention_policy"></a>
### Nested Schema for `retention_policy`

Optional:

- `quantity_to_keep` (Number) The quantity of items to keep.
- `unit` (String) The unit of time for the retention policy.

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The ID of the retention policy.
- `retention_type` (String) The type of retention policy.
- `space_id` (String) The ID of the space.
- `strategy` (String) The strategy for the retention policy.
